overview: The Azure Local Integration Architecture provides a robust framework for integrating Azure services with on-premises infrastructure, ensuring secure connectivity and management of both traditional and containerized applications.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Manages Azure services and tools, facilitating resource management and service integration.
security_considerations: Access control policies for Azure portal and CLI.
Use of Azure Key Vault for secure storage of secrets.
components.data_handling: Manages sensitive configuration and operational data.
components.encryption_status: Data in transit and at rest is encrypted.

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Hosts traditional non-containerized applications and Arc VMs, managed through Hyper-V.
security_considerations: Regular patching and updates for the Hyper-V environment.
components.encryption_status: Data at rest is encrypted using BitLocker.
vulnerabilities: Hyper-V vulnerabilities if not regularly updated.

components.name: Kubernetes-based Applications
components.description: Supports containerized applications using Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) enabled by Azure Arc.
security_considerations: Network policies to control pod communication.
Use of Azure Policy for Kubernetes for compliance.
components.data_handling: Handles application data and user requests.
components.encryption_status: Data in transit is encrypted using TLS.
vulnerabilities: Misconfigured RBAC leading to privilege escalation.

components.name: Validated Hardware
components.description: Specifies hardware configurations for Azure Local, supporting 1 to 16 machines.
security_considerations: Hardware security modules for cryptographic operations.
Regular hardware audits and compliance checks.
vulnerabilities: Hardware failures leading to data loss.

components.name: Switch/Router/Firewall
components.description: Manages East/West traffic between Azure Local machines and external networks.
security_considerations: Strict firewall rules to limit traffic.
Intrusion detection systems to monitor traffic.
components.encryption_status: Traffic encryption using VPN or TLS.

security_risks: Man-in-the-middle attacks if not properly secured.
Data leakage if network policies are misconfigured.

trust_boundaries.name: Corporate Firewall Boundary
recommendations: Regularly audit firewall rules and logs.

trust_boundaries.name: Azure Local Instance Boundary
vulnerabilities: Insufficient access controls leading to data breaches.
recommendations: Implement strict RBAC and regularly review permissions.
